answerText: Galahad or Galeas or Galath[10] Galahad is featured in the sixth book of this author's collection of Arthurian tales, entitled Le Morte d'Artur.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 10 | 9 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Bors and Perceval witness this man's ascent to heaven. For 10 points each: [10] Name this son of Lancelot and Elaine of Corbenic, who in most tellings of Arthurian legend is the Knight of the Round Table that is fated to find the Holy Grail.
